column4: it seems like the installer is just buggy.  did they rush this thing out today or what?

~ so long as you have debsigs-verify and blcr-dkms uninstalled it should work just fine. I had no issues other than man-db, ure, postgresql-common, and sun-jdk packages failing. but those were easy to fix
~ don't think anyone here is denying that
~ from what you're describing i agree that's NOT intuitive
